page.description: DeleteCNAMEEntry deletes an existing CNAME record.
page.prototype: .DeleteCNAMEEntry as L (From as C, To as C)

argument.name: From
argument.description: The DNS name from which the entry was mapped.

argument.name: To
argument.description: The DNS named to which the From parameter value was mapped (used for error checking).

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the call succeeded or .f. if the function call failed. See the contents of the CallResult property for more information on the cause of the error.

page.example:
' Delete a CNAME entry using DeleteCNAMEEntry()
dim cs as c ?A5DNS::Manager::ShowConnectionstringdialog(cs, cs) cs = "Provider='AmazonRoute53';Timeout='10000';AccessKey='xxxxxxx';SecretKey='xxxxxxxxx';Domain='mydomain.com.';" dim dnsm as A5DNS::Manager = null_value() Result = A5DNS::Manager::Open(dnsm,cs) ?dnsm.DeleteCNAMEEntry("foo.mydomain.com")
